ygData.subject: Re: Forage Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I started out making rat sandwiches...now I m up to wolf and bear sandwiches.  Of course, one of these days I ll move up to pies--but not until my cooking
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
>
> Oh my gosh - you're telling me those tasty pies I bought at the inn contain
> rat or dark elf meat! THE HORROR!
>
> I think we need to investigate whether we need to establish a Norrathian
> Food & Drug Administration....
>
> Slyde of Xegony

I started out making rat sandwiches...now I'm up to wolf and bear
sandwiches. Of course, one of these days I'll move up to pies--but not
until my cooking and smithing (and pottery if I remember right?) skills
get up to where I can be mostly self sufficient.

Grei of Bristlebane

--

If we're going to have fun, we've got to be serious about it.
